name: plzfixthx
description: Professional PowerPoint slide generation with AI

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix functions && npm install --prefix web
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix functions && npm run build --prefix web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix functions && npm run lint --prefix web
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix functions && npm run test --prefix web
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build:web && firebase deploy --only hosting

author: salscrudato
